ATI has dropped support for... MOST of the chipsets on the planet. You will have to use the open source drivers... which are decent... but... it is a shameful regression.

ATI dropped support for MOST of the chipsets out there with 12-5... but... this long predates that. Based on 10.04.. if       lspci | grep 'VGA' | grep -Ei '((R.)([2-7])|(9|X|ES)(1|2?)([0-9])(5|0)0|Xpress)                 returns a result then it's game over... that doesn't even address the HD 2xxx-4xxx series they dropped this year.
